snippet.title: BrokenLore: Don't Watch - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
BrokenLore: Don't Watch gets a gruesome new trailer. Check out this unsettling BrokenLore: Don't Watch trailer for the upcoming horror game and tour creepy hallways, get a glimpse at terrifying creatures, and a lot of eyeballs. BrokenLore: Don't Watch will be available on PC.

In BrokenLore: Don't Watch, immerse yourself in the haunting world of Shinji, a young hikikomori trapped in his Tokyo apartment. As his mind unravels, confront a malevolent entity watching from the shadows. Will you uncover the truth before it's too late?
